verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G3855"\w* \add Jesus\add* passed \w by|strong="G3855"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* which was \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \add his\add* \w birth|strong="G1079"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Master|strong="G4461"\w*, \w who|strong="G5101"\w* did \w sin|strong="G0264"\w*, this \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w*, \wj  \+w Neither|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G0264"\+w* \+w this man|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w sinned|strong="G0264"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3777"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w parents|strong="G1118"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w the works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w should be made manifest|strong="G5319"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I|strong="G1691"\+w* \+w must|strong="G1163"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2038"\+w* \+w the works|strong="G2041"\+w* \+w of him that sent|strong="G3992"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w while|strong="G2193"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w*: \+w the night|strong="G3571"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w work|strong="G2038"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w As long as|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G5600"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w the light|strong="G5457"\+w* \+w of the world|strong="G2889"\+w*.\wj*

When he \w had|strong="G2036"\w* \w thus|strong="G5023"\w* \w spoken|strong="G2036"\w*, he \w spat|strong="G4429"\w* on the \w ground|strong="G5476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w clay|strong="G4081"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w spittle|strong="G4427"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w anointed|strong="G2025"\w* the \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of the blind \w man|strong="G5185"\w* with the \w clay|strong="G4081"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go|strong="G5217"\+w*, \+w wash|strong="G3538"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the pool|strong="G2861"\+w* \+w of Siloam|strong="G4611"\+w*,\wj* (\w which|strong="G3739"\w* is by \w interpretation|strong="G2059"\w*, \w Sent|strong="G0649"\w*.) He went his \w way|strong="G0565"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w washed|strong="G3538"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w seeing|strong="G0991"\w*.

¶ The \w neighbours|strong="G1069"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w which|strong="G2334"\w* \w before|strong="G4386"\w* had \w seen|strong="G2334"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* he that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w begged|strong="G4319"\w*?

\w Some|strong="G0243"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* is \w he|strong="G2076"\w*: \w others|strong="G0243"\w* \add said\add*, He \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \add but\add* \w he|strong="G1565"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \add he\add*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* said \w they|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w were|strong="G0455"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w*?

\w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, A \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that is \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w clay|strong="G4081"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w anointed|strong="G2025"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w me|strong="G3427"\w*, \w Go|strong="G5217"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w pool|strong="G2861"\w* of \w Siloam|strong="G4611"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wash|strong="G3538"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* I \w went|strong="G0565"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w washed|strong="G3538"\w*, and I received \w sight|strong="G0308"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* said \w they|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Where|strong="G4226"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w he|strong="G1565"\w*? He \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

¶ They \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G5185"\w* \w aforetime|strong="G4218"\w* was \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w* \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w made|strong="G4160"\w* the \w clay|strong="G4081"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* he had received his \w sight|strong="G0308"\w*. He \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, He \w put|strong="G2007"\w* \w clay|strong="G4081"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I \w washed|strong="G3538"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* do \w see|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w*, \w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* he \w keepeth|strong="G5083"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*. \w Others|strong="G0243"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, \w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w* that is a \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w such|strong="G5108"\w* \w miracles|strong="G4592"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w was|strong="G2258"\w* a \w division|strong="G4978"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

They \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto the blind \w man|strong="G5185"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w sayest|strong="G3004"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he hath \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*? He \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, He \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*.

\w But|strong="G3767"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w did|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w concerning|strong="G4012"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he had \w been|strong="G2258"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* received his \w sight|strong="G0308"\w*, \w until|strong="G2193"\w* they \w called|strong="G5455"\w* the \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* of \w him|strong="G0846"\w* that had received his \w sight|strong="G0308"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w asked|strong="G2065"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Is|strong="G2076"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*? \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w then|strong="G3767"\w* doth \w he|strong="G0991"\w* \w now|strong="G0737"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w*?

\w His|strong="G0846"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, We \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* by what \w means|strong="G4459"\w* \w he|strong="G0991"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w seeth|strong="G0991"\w*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*; \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w who|strong="G5101"\w* hath \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: \w he|strong="G0846"\w* is \w of|strong="G2192"\w* \w age|strong="G2244"\w*; \w ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: \w he|strong="G0846"\w* shall \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w himself|strong="G0848"\w*.

\w These|strong="G5023"\w* \add words\add* \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w feared|strong="G5399"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* the \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* had \w agreed|strong="G4934"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* did \w confess|strong="G3670"\w* that he \w was|strong="G0846"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, he should be \w put|strong="G1096"\w* out of the \w synagogue|strong="G0656"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w*, He \w is|strong="G2192"\w* of \w age|strong="G2244"\w*; \w ask|strong="G2065"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* \w again|strong="G1537"\w* called \w they|strong="G5455"\w* the \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Give|strong="G1325"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* the \w praise|strong="G1391"\w*: \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w*.

\w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Whether|strong="G1487"\w* he \w be|strong="G2076"\w* a \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w* \add or no\add*, I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*: one \w thing|strong="G1520"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w*, whereas I \w was|strong="G5607"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*, \w now|strong="G0737"\w* I \w see|strong="G0991"\w*.

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* said \w they|strong="G2036"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* did \w he|strong="G4160"\w* to \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*? \w how|strong="G4459"\w* opened \w he|strong="G0455"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*?

He \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, I have \w told|strong="G2036"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w already|strong="G2235"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye \w did|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*: \w wherefore|strong="G5101"\w* would \w ye|strong="G2309"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*? \w will|strong="G2309"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G3767"\w* they \w reviled|strong="G3058"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w his|strong="G1565"\w* \w disciple|strong="G3101"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w Moses’|strong="G3475"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*.

\w We|strong="G2249"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="G3475"\w*: \add as \+w for|strong="G1161"\+w*\add* \w this|strong="G5126"\w* \add fellow\add*, we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* from \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w*.

The \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G1063"\w* \w herein|strong="G5129"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* a marvellous \w thing|strong="G2298"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* from \w whence|strong="G4159"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add yet\add* he hath \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* we \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w if|strong="G1437"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w be|strong="G5600"\w* a worshipper of \w God|strong="G2318"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w doeth|strong="G4160"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w*, \w him|strong="G5127"\w* he \w heareth|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w Since|strong="G1537"\w* the world \w began|strong="G0165"\w* was \w it|strong="G0191"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* the \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* of one that was \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* this \w man|strong="G3778"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, he \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3756"\w*.

They \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w wast|strong="G1080"\w* \w altogether|strong="G3650"\w* \w born|strong="G1080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dost|strong="G1321"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* \w teach|strong="G1321"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*? \w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w*.

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they had \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w out|strong="G1854"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when he had \w found|strong="G2147"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Dost|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4771"\+w* \+w believe|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*?\wj*

\w He|strong="G1565"\w* \w answered|strong="G0611"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* is \w he|strong="G2076"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I might \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Thou hast|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w both|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w seen|strong="G3708"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w he|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w that talketh|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4675"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, I \w believe|strong="G4100"\w*. \w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w worshipped|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w For|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w judgment|strong="G2917"\+w* \+w I|strong="G1473"\+w* \+w am come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5126"\+w* \+w world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w they which see|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w might see|strong="G0991"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w that they which see might|strong="G0991"\+w* \+w be made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w blind|strong="G5185"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \add some\add* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* which \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w words|strong="G5023"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Are|strong="G2070"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w blind|strong="G5185"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*?

\w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w If|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w ye were|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w blind|strong="G5185"\+w*, \+w ye should have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w now|strong="G3568"\+w* \+w ye say|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w We see|strong="G0991"\+w*; \+w therefore|strong="G3767"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w sin|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w remaineth|strong="G3306"\+w*.\wj*
